select b.* from (select ROWNUM rn, a.* from (select c.board_no, c.mem_no, c.title, c.crp_ctg, c.price, c.qty, c.rep, c.reg_date, c.reg_stts, nvl(r.rate_avg, 0) as rate_avg from crops_sale c left join (select nvl(round(avg(rate), 1), 0) as rate_avg, board_no from review group by board_no) r on c.board_no = r.board_no
c.reg_stts = 'e1'
and c.crp_ctg = #{category}
and c.title like '%${search}%'
order by c.reg_date desc
order by c.price desc
order by c.price asc
order by rate_avg desc
order by rate_avg asc
) a
where ROWNUM <= #{page} * 9) b where b.rn > (#{page} - 1) * 9
